dct_description_sm: Shows township and range, private claims, county boundaries, land district boundaries, towns, railroads, water features, and townships containing coal. Also shows Indian, military and forest reservations.; At head of title: Department of the Interior, General Land Office, William A. Richards, Commissioner.; Dec. 19 1906 -- title section.; S Doc 194 59 2-- lower right margin.; Insets: Leadville -- City of Denver -- Cripple Creek.
dct_publisher_sm: Andrew B. Graham Co., Photo-Lithographers (Washington, D.C)
